info.description:
The appointment service implements all appointment and reminder functions for GroupAlarm

# Authentication

info.title: groupalarm Appointment API

post.description: Create an appointment with the passed parameters

schema.description: Appointment contains the information of a single appointment

items.description: AppointmentParticipant describes an invited user inside of an appointment

feedback.description: AppointmentFeedbackStatus describes the current feedback status of an user

API_Token.description: To use this API, you need an API-Token from the RBAC settings of your GroupAlarm organization. Place the token inside the HTTP-Header `API-Token` for every request, otherwise the API will return an "401 Unauthorized" error for your request.
API_Token.name: API-TOKEN

Personal-Access-Token.description: To use this API, you need a Personal Access Token from your profile settings. Place the token inside the HTTP-Header `Personal-Access-Token` for every request, otherwise the API will return an "401 Unauthorized" error for your request.
Personal-Access-Token.name: Personal-Access-Token

AccessAllowedResponse.description: AccessAllowedResponse contains whether the organization allows access or not

EventCreationItem.description: EventCreationItem is used by the different services to create a new audit-log item

EventList.description: An EventList contains multiple EventListItems and a TotalEvents count used for pagination

items.description: An EventListItem is used as a single audit-log entry in an EventList

user.description: User is a basic copy of user-service's PublicUser

totalEvents.description: total amount of events inside the events array

EventListItem.description: An EventListItem is used as a single audit-log entry in an EventList

user.description: User is a basic copy of user-service's PublicUser

EventService.description: EventService provides all methods needed to list and create audit-log entries

Feature.description: Feature contains all information about a single feature

FeatureRegistryService.description: FeatureRegistryService provides all functions needed to manage a feature registry

ICalService.description: ICalService contains all definitions for the appointment logic

ICalToken.description: ICalToken contains the personal token for the ical access

items.description: This is used for user to role assignment
items.title: Definition of a user-role payload

OrganizationService.description: OrganizationService provides all functions needed to check for expired accesses to organizations

PersonalAccessToken.description: This is used for personal access token interaction

PersonalAccessTokenRequest.description: This is used for creation of personal access tokens
PersonalAccessTokenRequest.title: Definition of a personal access token request payload

PersonalAccessTokenService.description: PersonalAccessTokenService contains all methods needed to implement our service

PostgresEventService.description: PostgresEventService is our implementation of EventService using a Postgres database

PostgresPersonalAccessTokenService.description: PostgresPersonalAccessTokenService is our PersonalAccessTokenService implementation using a database

SupportOrganization.description: SupportOrganization represents a single organization and the timestamp when it allowed support agents to access it
